name: ZZ - BDFED - MLB (AWS) POSTSEASON PUSH
description:
- This will be an added module to the miniSB that will be place above the current SB in XL and L viewports
- PS Push will be for team that are "X" amount of games out of Playoff hunt
- Can be added/removed with CMS config
- EPIC - https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/BDFED-1415
- Mocks can be found here: https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/BDFED-1365
- CMS config - https://s3.amazonaws.com/cms-mlb-app-content-beta/mlb/en/page/v1/mlb/homepage/index/web-v1.json
